data.comment: The match has started, with Flamengo kicking-off.
Flamengo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Flamengo in the half of Botafogo.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a Botafogo throw-in in Flamengo's half.
In the minute 4, Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Botafogo.
Goal kick for Flamengo at Estadio do Maracana.
Botafogo have a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Botafogo to take a throw-in in Flamengo territory.
Free kick Botafogo.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 9, Can Flamengo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Botafogo's half?
Flamengo drives forward and Matheus Franca gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ball safe as Flamengo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 12, Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 16, Rodrigo Caio (Flamengo) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
Bruno Henrique (Flamengo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Botafogo at Estadio do Maracana.
Throw-in Flamengo.
Filipe Luis for Flamengo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 17, Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Botafogo a goal kick.
Throw-in for Flamengo in their own half.
Ball safe as Flamengo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 20, Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Flamengo in the half of Botafogo.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
Botafogo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Flamengo push upfield and Bruno Henrique gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Botafogo defence.
In the minute 24, Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Botafogo are pushing forward but Luis Henrique Tomaz de Lima's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Flamengo goal kick.
In the minute 28, Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
Flamengo to take a throw-in in Botafogo territory.
In the minute 31, Botafogo's Keisuke Honda gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 35, Flamengo's Gabriel Barbosa is on target but unsuccessful.
Flamengo have a dangerous throw-in.
In Rio de Janeiro Flamengo attack through Gabriel Barbosa. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 35, Goal kick for Botafogo at Estadio do Maracana.
Free kick Flamengo.
Flamengo will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Botafogo.
In the minute 37, Everton Ribeiro (Flamengo) gets a yellow card.
Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Flamengo a goal kick.
In the minute 44, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in high up the field for Botafogo in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Flamengo.
Matheus Babi returns to the field for Botafogo after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 45, Botafogo needs to be cautious. Flamengo have an attacking throw-in.
The first-half is over.
The match at Estadio do Maracana has been interrupted briefly for a check on Matheus Babi, who is down injured.
The second-half is underway. Botafogo with the kick-off.
In the minute 47, Corner awarded to Flamengo.
Throw-in for Flamengo at Estadio do Maracana.
Free kick for Flamengo in the half of Botafogo.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
In the minute 49, Matheus Franca is booked for the home team.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Botafogo close to the penalty box.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Flamengo.
In the minute 56, Caio Alexandre (Botafogo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in Flamengo.
Ball goes out of play for a Flamengo goal kick.
In the minute 58, Pedro Raul is replacing Rafael Forster for Botafogo at Estadio do Maracana.
Paulo Autuori is making the team's second substitution at Estadio do Maracana with Federico Barrandeguy replacing Kevin.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Flamengo in their own half.
Can Botafogo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Flamengo's half?
In the minute 60, Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
Rodrigo Caio (Flamengo) has received a first yellow card.
Throw-in Botafogo.
Danilo Barcelos is replacing Caio Alexandre for the away team.
In the minute 63, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
Flamengo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 65, Domenec Torrent Font (Flamengo) is making a first substitution, with Thuler replacing Rodrigo Caio.
Vitinho is on a sub for Pedro Rocha for Flamengo.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 67, Free kick for Flamengo in the half of Botafogo.
Botafogo push forward at Estadio do Maracana and Pedro Raul gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Flamengo defence.
Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
In the minute 69, Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Flamengo make their third substitution with Thiago Maia replacing Diego.
In the minute 70, Botafogo's Pedro Raul is whistled for offside at Estadio do Maracana.
Free kick in a good position for Flamengo!
Federico Barrandeguy (Botafogo) has received a first yellow card.
Important block from the Botafogo defence as Vitinho fires in a strike for Flamengo.
In the minute 72, Corner awarded to Flamengo.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden waits before resuming play because Vitinho for Flamengo is still down.
Vitinho for Flamengo is back on the field again.
In the minute 75, Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a Flamengo throw-in in Botafogo's half.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
Rhuan is on a sub for Matheus Babi for Botafogo.
In the minute 79, Botafogo's Luis Henrique Tomaz de Lima breaks free at Estadio do Maracana. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Flamengo have a goal kick.
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Botafogo in the half of Flamengo.
Throw-in for Botafogo at Estadio do Maracana.
The away team replace Keisuke Honda with Luiz Otavio.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Botafogo in their own half.
The home team have replaced Everton Ribeiro with Pedro. This is the fourth substitution made today by Domenec Torrent Font.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 84, Ball safe as Botafogo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Botafogo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
In the minute 87, Gabriel Barbosa (Flamengo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Flamengo.
In the minute 89, Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Flamengo.
Flamengo's Willian Arao breaks free at Estadio do Maracana. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Botafogo goal kick.
Throw-in for Botafogo at Estadio do Maracana.
Can Botafogo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Flamengo's half?
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Botafogo.
Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Botafogo's Kanu gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Flamengo defender.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
Bruno Henrique hits the bar! Very nearly a goal there for Flamengo in Rio de Janeiro.
Penalty! Leandro Pedro Vuaden points to the spot, great chance for Flamengo...
Leandro Pedro Vuaden blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
Goal! Pedro Raul gives Botafogo a 0-1 lead.
Marcelo Benevenuto for Botafogo has been booked by Leandro Pedro Vuaden and receives a first yellow card.
Goal! Gabriel Barbosa makes it 1-1. The equalizer came in the form of a penalty.
